column5: I thought I had a best friend once but then I realized I wasn’t her best friend. And to this day, I’ve never called someone my best friend even when they call me one because I felt like most of the time they weren’t really serious and because I don’t want to get my feelings hurt. She never really knew how that impacted my life.

I always get long ass vivid dreams when I stay up late then go to sleep. Like when you’re so sleepy, your eyes are trying to shut down but you’re fighting it because you’re doing something and you don’t want to sleep yet. Idk, that works for me.
